title: Interpretation of seeing meat cut in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cutting meat in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. A person cuts meat before cooking it in order to arrange it faster, but what does cutting meat in a dream indicate and what are its repercussions? Today the article will present the interpretation of seeing cutting meat in a dream according to great translators such as Ibn Sirin. Ibn Kathir and other dream interpretation scholars, depending on the condition of the dreamer, follow us. Interpretation of seeing cutting meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing cutting ripe meat in a dream indicates a lot of good and abundant sustenance for the pioneer. Seeing yourself cutting raw meat in a dream indicates that bad things will happen. In the dreamer’s life. Cutting lean meat in a dream refers to the dreamer’s approach, and God knows best. Seeing yourself cutting camel meat in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness, blessings and comfort in his life. Cutting rotten meat in a dream suggests that the viewer will be exposed to a serious health problem in the dream. Next season, and God knows best. Seeing yourself cutting red meat in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will be exposed to many problems and fears in the coming period. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing meat of intention in a dream. Interpretation of seeing cutting meat in a dream about Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi will interpret seeing cutting meat in a dream. It shows that the dreamer will be exposed to bad things. In the coming period. Cutting raw meat in a dream indicates that the dreamer is exposed to a major calamity and problem because of someone close to him. Seeing yourself cutting meat in a dream represents the many sins that the dreamer has committed in his life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream. Interpretation of seeing cutting meat in a dream for a single woman. Vision In a dream, a single woman cuts meat with a knife. It indicates that she has suffered many failures in her professional and scientific life. Cutting raw meat in a dream for a single woman is a cue for the death of someone close to her in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing a woman alone cutting cooked meat in a dream shows that he will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing cutting meat in a dream For a married woman: Seeing a married woman cutting raw meat with a knife in a dream indicates numerous disputes and problems between her and her family. Cutting the meat of a corpse in a dream for a married woman announces the separation between her and her husband, and God knows best. Seeing minced meat in a dream for a married woman indicates that her husband is treating her inappropriately and she feels very sad and miserable. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream. Interpretation of seeing cutting meat in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing yourself cutting cooked meat in a dream for a pregnant woman announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Cutting red meat in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will face some health problems during the birth process. Seeing A pregnant woman cutting chicken meat in a dream announces that she will give birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing cutting meat in a dream for a man: Seeing a man cutting meat in a dream shows that he has a strong personality and controls all his family’s affairs without getting involved. Seeing a man working in a shearing shop

title: Learn about the dream interpretation of a camel attack by Ibn Sirin and a small camel in a dream and escaping from a camel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a camel attack: Is it good or bad to see a camel attack? What are the negative interpretations of a dream about a camel attack? What does a black camel attack in a dream mean? In the following lines, we will talk about the interpretation of the vision of a camel attacking unmarried, married, pregnant, and divorced women, according to Ibn Sirin and interpretive scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a camel attack: A camel attack in a dream indicates the dreamer’s weak character and his escape from the responsibilities and painful situations he is going through. If the camel suddenly attacks the dreamer in his dream, this A sign of his defeat before his enemies and his feeling of weakness and helplessness due to his inability to overcome them. The dream interpretation of a camel attack by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted a camel attack as a sign that the dreamer is facing many problems, but he is patient and patient and is trying to change his life for the better. If the dreamer slaughters the camel that is attacking him, this It indicates that he will suffer from chronic diseases or be exposed to some health problems for a long time and the dreamer will remain there. The specialized online dream interpretation website features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet on Google. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman being attacked by a camel. Scientists interpreted a camel attack in an unmarried woman’s dream as a sign of the presence of someone who is bewitching her and intends to destroy her life, so she must be careful even if the dreamer sees a camel attacking her and cannot escape. . From him, this symbolizes the emergence of a serious quarrel with a friend soon and their separation from each other. If the dreamer sees a camel attacking her and running after her on the road, this means that she is suffering from injustice and abuse from a member of her family and her inability to defend herself and remove the harm from her. It's worth it. Interpretation of a dream about a camel attack for a married woman. Scientists interpreted a camel attack in the dreamer's dream as increasing his worries and his need for a short period of rest until the psychological pressure he is suffering from ends. If the dreamer sees her husband riding a camel and attacking her, this means that she feels fear for him. And discomfort from his excessive jealousy and restrictive controls. Interpretation of a dream about a camel attacking a pregnant woman. Commentators believe that a camel attacking a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign that she will give birth to her child easily and smoothly and will not face any problems during childbirth. Scientists have interpreted a white camel attacking a pregnant woman as a sign of her good condition. Her closeness to God Almighty and her desire to make the souls of those she meets happy, and if she sees a camel attacking her in her. A bedroom, and this indicates her feeling of weakness and brokenness and her suffering from many disagreements and problems with her life partner. Interpretation of a dream about a camel attacking a divorced woman. Scientists interpreted a dream about a camel attacking a divorced woman as a sign of her suffering from despair and depression and trying to hide her sadness from everyone, and her life is behaving ignorantly and imbalanced. If he sees The dreamer sees a camel attacking her and fighting with her, as this leads to her defeat in front of her enemies and a feeling of helplessness and powerlessness. Some interpreters have said that a camel being attacked sometimes symbolizes the death of a friend

title: Interpretation of seeing a hijab in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a scarf: Seeing a hijab in a dream is evidence that you are approaching God Almighty by doing good, and interpretation scholars see the colored hijab in their dreams for goodness, happiness, and food from a lawful source, and in dreams for the main sin. As a seeker of knowledge, this vision shows success, excellence, and the fulfillment of all the difficult dreams desired. And a lady in the details. Read also: The penguin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream. The veil in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of the engagement of a rich person. Putting the veil on a single girl who has never been married in a dream indicates that she is in a high position at work. From It is unfortunate that the veil is torn or soiled in a dream, and this vision represents poverty in money and a huge loss that the girl is already suffering from. Wearing the veil of joy in a dream is good news for marriage to a person who is famous among the people, and removing the veil in a dream is a deprivation of God’s rights. In a married woman’s dream The hijab indicates the good reputation and high morals that distinguish her among people. If a married woman buys the hijab in her dreams, this indicates the positive changes that she and her husband expected and it can predict a healthy fetus from any harm. The black hijab in a dream is a great reward and happiness from God. Read Also: Washing the dead. The connotations and meanings of seeing a veil in a dream. If a girl sees herself in a dream with a long veil, this indicates her innocence, secrets, and prominent characteristics that distinguish her from her parents. A short veil dreaming of a girl who has not married again indicates tension and fear of the future. Seeing a white veil in a dream is news. Good for marriage and receiving money from a lawful source. Interpretation of the meaning of the hijab in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing a pregnant woman in the hijab in a dream indicates the approaching situation and ease of childbirth. The pregnant woman who uncovered the veil in her dreams also feels anxiety and severe pain and is trying to get rid of it. Buying a new hijab for the pregnant woman In a dream - to obtain a high position at work and make a big difference in reality. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. A man in a dream wears a hijab. To dream of a man wearing a hijab is evil, bad morals, and a sign of religion. The hijab also shows a high position at work. The only dream hijab It is marrying a beautiful girl, which may portend a quick, lawful life. If a man exposes his wife in a dream, this indicates the defects of God’s law and his distance from righteous worship, and the dreamer must repent for his sins. Wearing the hijab in a divorced woman’s dream. Wearing the hijab in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence May God reward you greatly. Buying a hijab in your dreams also means marrying a respectable person. The hijab in a divorced woman’s dream indicates concealment, purity, and blessed survival. A white hijab in a dream means a very high position at work. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a colored hijab in Dream Scientists have concluded that seeing the entire veil in a dream indicates the viewer’s purity, good morals, and commitment to religion. The interpretation of a dream about a colored veil is considered one of the praiseworthy visions in a dream because it is good news.

title: Interpretation of a dream about not winning a competition in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream that you do not win a competition in a dream When you want to know Interpretation of a dream that you do not win a competition in a dream One of the dreams is very disturbing so they are looking for an interpretation from this dream, but the reader must also prevent absolute disbelief, because it is from the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach To the fact, he makes mistakes and can get infected, in addition to the fact that the site and its administrators have nothing. To do with the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about not winning a competition in a dream: In the event that you see losing in a competition, it may indicate an inability to achieve goals and ambitions. Seeing that you do not win a competition in a dream may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life. This vision may indicate The dreamer’s mind is busy with many things and he needs to ask God for help. To see that he did not win the competition could indicate the serious tensions that the dreamer experienced during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about winning a sum of money in a dream may indicate the presence of a lot of money To the goodness and blessing that the dreamer will enjoy in his life in those days. Anyone who dreams that he has won a large sum of money may indicate his success and success in life during that period. It is possible that seeing a profit of a sum of money in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get a job. New or being promoted at work, thanks to God. It is possible to see that you win a sum of money in a dream, as this means getting closer to God, Blessed and Most High, and refraining from committing sins and disobedience, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about winning a fight in a dream. It is possible that it is a vision of victory. In battle, it indicates that the dreamer’s goals will be achieved by God’s grace. This vision may indicate salvation from enemies and victory over them, and he must seek God’s help. In the event that someone sees that he is winning a race, this may indicate happy news that the dreamer may receive during this period. If a person sees himself winning a race, the dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about winning elections in a dream. Winning elections in a dream can indicate getting rid of problems and difficulties in the dreamer’s life, thanks to God. Whoever sees in his dream That he won the elections may indicate happy events that will happen to the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Dreaming of winning the elections in a dream may indicate many material gains that the dreamer will obtain during this period. And if one sees this in the election, it may indicate To overcome the difficulties and crises that the dreamer experienced at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about winning a fight in a dream: Winning a race in a dream may indicate that the dreamer’s condition will improve for the better, thanks to God. In the event that a person thinks that he has won a race, this can indicate To victory in his life during this period. title: Dream interpretation of seeing shaving in a dream for single and married women and men, according to the most famous interpreters

preview.html: The interpretation of the dream of seeing shaving, such as seeing shaving in a dream, is considered one of the praiseworthy and reprehensible visions that a person can see in a dream. Among the various goals, whether for cleanliness, a beautiful view, or other things, and many interpretations, scholars have interpreted the vision of shaving in a dream, whether it is a man, a human being, or a married woman. Or otherwise, and the interpretation of seeing shaving depends on many different things, and through the following article we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeing shaving in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing shaving in a dream for a single woman. There is no doubt that if one girl sees in a dream that she is shaving, this vision shows many The various interpretations and through the following paragraph we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeing shaving in a dream for an unmarried girl as follows: If an unmarried girl sees that she is shaving her head, this vision indicates that she is sick. But if an unmarried girl sees herself shaving her head in a dream, this may indicate The death of one of her relatives. It should be noted that, according to what scholars have explained, seeing an unmarried girl shaving her head indicates that she is facing difficulty or a crisis in her life. See also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing long black hair in a dream for a single woman and a married woman in Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Shaving in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself shaving in a dream, this vision can foretell good or bad for her. Below we will learn about the interpretation of seeing shaving in a dream for a married woman with the following points: If a married woman sees that she is shaving her head, this indicates her good relationship with her husband. And her love for him. It is worth noting that interpretive scholars interpreted a married woman’s dream of shaving her hair as a sign that she is approaching menopause. It should be noted that if a married woman sees her husband shaving his head in a dream, this means that she will be exposed to problems in her married life. After we put together the interpretation of a dream about seeing a razor in a dream for a married woman and a single girl. Interpretation scholars have explained many of the interpretations that have appeared regarding a pregnant woman seeing a razor in her dream, as if the pregnant woman saw that she was shaving her head. This vision indicates goodness and happiness in life. If a pregnant woman sees shaved hair in a dream, this dream indicates the ease of the birth process and the peaceful passage of this period. If you see a man shaving his hair with his hand, this indicates that he has lost his current job. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing white hair for a married woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing white hair in a dream Of course, many women want to always appear charming and distinguished and pay special attention to their hair. To look healthy and bright, but on the other hand, panic and fear as soon as white hair or signs of gray hair appear on her head, as she dyes it immediately, but when you see this dream, it can indicate the arrival of absence or contracting certain diseases and sometimes exposure to financial crises, so let us leave us in the lines Next, we will examine with you the opinions of jurists and interpretive scholars regarding seeing white hair in a dream for a married or unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream about white hair in a dream. Many jurists differed in the interpretation of seeing white hair in a dream. Some report it as a sign of longevity, health and well-being, and good recovery from health crises. Therefore, if a sick person sees them, the good news for him is that it heralds a speedy recovery and it can also indicate the dignity and prestige that is reflected in the person’s external appearance. White hair in a dream, but there are some other opinions that have explained that gray hair in a dream is a bad omen that indicates poverty. In some cases, it indicates weakness, frailty, and infection with some diseases. If a wealthy person sees this in a dream, this means losing his property and money on the stock market or exposing him to some fraud and theft attempts that will make him suffer a financial crisis and be forced to borrow from others. Interpretation of seeing white hair for a girl Unmarried and married women: If a woman is married and sees that her hair has become white and signs of graying appear on it, this means that she has committed some mistakes against her husband or herself, which has made her ignore her appearance and pay attention to other useless matters. It may also indicate her betrayal of her husband and her guilt. Interpretation of seeing gray hair on the front of the head for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of gray hair on the front of her head indicates that she is suffering from many problems in her life at that time, and this prevents her from feeling comfortable and undermines her life. If the dreamer sees gray hair during her sleep In the front of the head, this is a sign that there are many disagreements prevailing in her relationship with her husband, which makes things very turbulent between them and makes her want to divorce him. If the dreamer sees in her dream gray hair in the front of the head and loves its shape, this expresses very good things that will happen in her life. In the coming period and it will make her very comfortable. If a woman sees in her dream gray hair on the front of her head, this is a sign that all responsibilities fall on her shoulders only and this makes her very tired and makes her unable to focus on her own goals. Seeing the dreamer during her sleep with gray hair on the front of the head , indicates that in the coming days she will suffer from a deterioration in her health condition, and as a result she will be in severe pain and will be bedridden. For a long time. Seeing white facial hair. Seeing the dreamer in a dream with white facial hair indicates that he is suffering from many problems during this period and cannot feel comfortable at all in his life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about taking off shoes and then putting them on in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about taking off shoes and then putting them on in a dream. Today we will learn about the most important interpretations and clues related to those strange visions that many people see and want to know their meaning and interpretations. Let us learn about the most important of these interpretations and their important effects today. Interpretation of a dream about taking off shoes and then putting them on in a dream: Seeing a single girl taking off her shoes and putting them back on is a sign that she will move to a new life in the coming days. A woman dreams of taking off her shoes and putting them back on, in connection with her move from her family’s home. To her husband’s house at that time. The interpretation of seeing taking off shoes in a dream and putting them on is a sign of satisfaction with reality in those days. When a woman sees that she is taking off her shoes and putting them on, this is evidence of the stability of family conditions at that time after major problems. Interpretation of a dream of cutting shoes in a dream: If The girl saw the bowl cutting her shoes, so this is a sign that she will marry someone she will meet in the next few days who will rape her. Seeing shoes being cut in a dream is a sign of the bad reputation that the dreamer has among people. Dreaming of cutting shoes in a dream is evidence of many... Of the problems and fears that the visionary will face in the coming days. Interpretation of dreams about leather shoes: Seeing yourself wearing leather shoes in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s upcoming trip during that period. Dreaming of leather shoes in a dream that men wear is a sign of entering a new project in the coming period. Seeing yourself wearing Leather shoes in a dream indicate a new business that the dreamer will enter into in the coming days. Seeing leather shoes in a dream generally indicates positive changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this period. Interpretation of a dream about wearing black shoes in a dream. Seeing black shoes in a dream is a sign of high status that The dreamer will acquire them in the coming days. A man dreams of wearing black shoes in a dream, which is an indication of his progress at work and his new promotion. Seeing black shoes in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her psychological suffering at that time. Seeing black shoes in a dream for a pot girl is a sign of She will marry a rich young man in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about losing shoes and finding them in a dream: Anyone who dreams of finding lost shoes is a sign that he will get a lot of money in the near future. Seeing lost shoes and finding them again is a sign of recovery from illness during that period. Period. Seeing shoes lost and found again is a sign of the end of the crises and troubles that their owner suffered from. Seeing the loss and finding of shoes in a dream is a sign of a difficult period and great difficulty that will pass through the dreamer, but it will end soon. Interpretation of a dream about cutting shoes for a married woman in a dream: seeing shoes cut In a dream, it indicates that a married woman is a sign of many problems that she was suffering from during that period. Dreaming that you are cutting a shoe in a dream is an indication of many difficulties.

title: Interpretation of dreams to see slippers in a dream... breaking off the engagement and marriage!

preview.html: Dream interpretation scholars explain to us the different meanings and associations that are referred to when we see slippers in a dream, especially since the color of the slippers affects the meaning and that cut slippers are different from new slippers and other things that the interpretation of the dream includes. This vision. Interpretation of seeing a stuntman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the theft of slippers in a dream. Al-Nabulsi believes that stealing slippers in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face many problems and challenges in the coming period. Stealing the dreamer's slippers may also indicate that the dreamer will face problems or a financial crisis in the near future. Stealing slippers in a pregnant woman's dream indicates a deficiency in this pregnancy, especially if it is in the first months of pregnancy. As for stealing slippers in the dream of an unmarried girl, it indicates the dissolution of her current fiancé. Interpretation of a dream about the liver in a dream in detail. Hitting slippers in a dream If the dreamer is injured by slippers, this indicates that he will be exposed to many difficult problems and challenges that he will face in the coming period. Hitting slippers in a dream means that the dreamer is exposed to envy, hatred and hatred from those around him. Hitting slippers in a dream can be a sign of many negative changes in the dreamer's life in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a vase in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about white slippers Dream interpreters confirm that buying new slippers in a dream indicates that the dreamer will marry soon, whether he is a young man or a girl. It indicates White slippers indicate good news coming to the dreamer in the coming period. White slippers in a married woman's dream also indicate the arrival of a lot of good and abundant sustenance in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about black slippers for single women Ibn Sirin believes that black slippers for an unmarried girl indicate that she will marry a man of high status and high value in society. A girl buying new black slippers indicates that this girl will find a special job. However, if the black slippers that appear on the girl are cut or old, this indicates that she will marry a poor man who cannot bear it. Interpretation of seeing a dream about floods in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about black slippers for a married woman The appearance of black slippers in a married woman's dream is the result of a lot of psychological pressure, disappointment and despair that this woman feels. Black slippers for a married woman indicate an abundance of serious marital problems that recur in the next stage. Black slippers can be a sign of the dreamer's deteriorating financial situation. Interpretation of seeing a chick in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cutting slippers Dream interpreters consider cut slippers to be one of the signs that indicate that The dreamer will be exposed to a serious illness. The cut slipper also indicates the incomplete marriage of the unmarried engaged girl. If a married woman wears cut slippers in her dream, this may separate her from her husband due to her husband’s mistreatment. The cut slipper may indicate the loss of one of the dreamer’s relatives. title: Interpretation of worms in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of worms in a dream for a single woman. Recently, the Encyclopedia Net website has been relied upon to obtain dream interpretations. Signs and interpretations we learn together. Interpretation of worms in a dream for a single woman. According to what Ibn Sirin said about an unmarried woman who saw worms in a dream, we quote the following: Seeing individual worms of small worms indicates a close marriage. Seeing an unmarried woman eating worms in a dream means suffering And anxiety, and it may also indicate that the girl will fall into distress or disaster. Worms walking on the body of an unmarried woman in a dream indicate a group of enemies who may be relatives who cause her harm while she is unaware of their reality. The spread of worms in the home of a single person indicates problems And the difficulties that an unmarried woman and her family suffer from. Seeing an unmarried woman with worms in her hair indicates a lot of thinking, anxiety, and stress. Red worms in an unmarried woman’s dream: Seeing red worms in a dream is not welcome, as it indicates many differences and problems between single people and their families. It also indicates difficulties and unhappiness in trying to achieve goals and achieve what you seek and desire. White worms in an unmarried woman’s dream. White worms in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolize a strong and powerful man making advances to her. Seeing white worms in her bed indicates the presence of hypocrites in her life. They want to harm her and seek to harm her, and the presence of worms in the bed indicates the extent of this closeness. Black worms in a dream of an unmarried woman. Black worms in a dream indicate that a corrupt man will propose to her and she will reject him. Black worms in a dream symbolize evil and forbidden money, and her exit from A body in a dream can mean repentance for forbidden money and disorder. Black worms in a dream indicate that some people hate her and speak ill of her. Seeing a black worm in her house in a dream is a sign that someone is trying to steal something that is dear to her and her family. Green worms in Dream of an unmarried woman: Seeing a green worm is considered one of the good visions that bodes well for the dreamer because it indicates the acquisition of money, abundant livelihood, and success in study and work. Green worms in a married woman’s dream: The green worm in a married woman’s dream carries many good connotations. It portends material gains and stability in her married life, and portends the pregnancy of good offspring. Worms in food in a dream. Seeing worms in food means profit and lawful money. Seeing yourself eating worms in a dream symbolizes getting rid of problems, staying away from problems, and getting rid of stress. Seeing worms in food indicates stability in Family life and good life. Seeing worms coming out of the body in a dream. Worms coming out of the body, hand, or foot indicates illegal profit and forbidden money. It indicates worms coming out of the vagina during childbirth. Worms coming out of the eye symbolize...

title: Interpretation of seeing lettuce in a dream is for someone who takes it, gives it, or washes it from dirt

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing lettuce in a dream varies, as some believe that seeing it can be a sign of the blessing of returning green leaves, but there are also those who see it as repulsive or a loss of money, and for this you need to know the correct interpretation of what you see in a dream, and we will help you with that through the following lines. Interpretation of seeing lettuce In a dream, Ibn Sirin Perhaps Ibn Sirin did not talk at length about the interpretation of seeing lettuce in a dream, but it is sufficient for him to explain the following: He said that lettuce or anything green in a dream is a sign of blessing and livelihood or faith and piety. He also mentioned that anyone who sees himself walking in a green field Of lettuce or anything else is an indication of the pursuit of food and all of these things are praiseworthy. It is possible that lettuce is a sign of good health for the viewer. Lettuce in a dreamGiving lettuce in a dreamFor someone who sees himself giving lettuce, this can be interpreted as follows: What he gives Lettuce may be an indicator of the extent of the diet, which varies according to the amount of lettuce served. This may also indicate a benefit that the viewer derives from one of them. However, if lettuce is given to the dead person, this indicates a great misfortune that affects the fortuneteller or the loss of his money. Obtaining lettuce in a dream has been collected. Sayings of the commentators that receiving lettuce is good and a great blessing for the fortuneteller, and they can be interpreted as follows: In the case of a sick person and whoever sees that he is eating lettuce, this may be his recovery from the disease from which he suffers. Also, whoever takes lettuce and eats it, it immediately indicates health. Good procreation for the forerunner or fortune teller. If the fortune teller takes lettuce from the dead person, this indicates his benefit from the family of that dead person, but it may not last long. Seeing lettuce in a dream for single women. There are different interpretations of seeing lettuce in a dream for a single woman, which could be one of the following: It may indicate For a single woman, seeing lettuce indicates a bad relationship between you and a man, which indicates the corruption of his morals. Lettuce leaves also indicate that the dreamer has bad friends who do not want anything good for her. Whoever dreams of eating lettuce, this is an indication of diseases that he may suffer from, especially in the abdominal area. In Other interpretations: Eating lettuce in a person’s dream indicates a loss, whether at work or in exams. But anyone who sees himself carrying lettuce just leaves it without eating it, this is good news for finding solutions to the problems that he may have been facing. Whatever you see, he is buying lettuce from a vendor. This is not good news, but rather something unpleasant that affects her at work, study, or even with her fiancé. But it is good to see lettuce with other vegetables in a person’s dream, because it is a sign of tremendous benefit and favor. Washing lettuce in a dream There is someone who dreams of washing and cleaning lettuce. This is explained as follows: If the lettuce is cleaned and washed from the dirt and mud that sticks to it, then it indicates the purity and cleansing that the dreamer does with his money and it brings blessing and benefit. Likewise, washing the lettuce can be a sign of moral righteousness and a return to reason after the delusion that he suffered. God. But if the dreamer cleans the lettuce from the dry soil on it, then this
